blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Sirius: I’m not that dramatic.
Lily: When I asked you why you were wearing a bejewelled tiara you quoted the entirety of...
body:
Sirius: I’m not that dramatic.
Lily: When I asked you why you were wearing a bejewelled tiara you quoted the entirety of Shakespeare’s "all the worlds a stage" monologue from As You Like It and then broke down crying. And you know the scariest part? You were sober.

dialogue.name: Lily
dialogue.label: Lily:
dialogue.phrase: When I asked you why you were wearing a bejewelled tiara you quoted the entirety of Shakespeare’s "all the worlds a stage" monologue from As You Like It and then broke down crying. And you know the scariest part? You were sober.

summary: No  offense for the Fantastic Beasts actors, but hyping the new movie as 'the darkest Harry Potter ever' seems unlikely and...
body: No offense for the Fantastic Beasts actors, but hyping the new movie as ‘the darkest Harry Potter ever’ seems unlikely and stupid. They are biased and it’s clear.

blog.name: potterreread
blog.title: A Potter Reread
blog.description: I recently started rereading all the books, something I haven't done in years. I decided to heighten the experience by listening to a few podcasts that discuss the chapters and figured, why not blog about it on tumblr as well.

tags: harry potter and the sacred text
those are all the podcasts I have so far but I may find more along the way
title: Introduction: My Potter Story
body:
I’m one of those people who’s been around since the beginning. My love of reading was apparent from an early age. I like to say I inherited it from my grandfather who owns a huge collection of books, a whole library really. I taught myself to read at 5 so by the time I entered school I was ahead of the class on this account and I always devoured anything magical, mythological or fantastic above all.

When I was 7 or 8 the first Harry Potter book was published in my language (Icelandic). With my reading love already well established it was only natural that I got the book for either my birthday or christmas, I honestly can’t remember which. I read it and I was in love.

There’s not a great number of books translated into Icelandic, at least nothing compared to the English language hoard of books available, so I read through everything at my small local library (I am not exaggerating when I say I had read every book in any way magical before the age of 14). So I tended to reread books a lot and Harry Potter was one of my favourites to do this with. Basically I reread the first book until the second came out. Then I read the first and second in order again and again until the third came out, and so on.

By the 4th book my father offered to buy me the book in English, saying it would be good practice. I didn’t trust myself just yet to understand everything in it and with Harry I wanted to understand every word. When the 6th book came out I was ready. I was tired of waiting (at first half a year often, with the later books and the series growing popularity only a month or two) for a translation, I had already waited for Jo to finish writing the book and I knew I could handle it. So I switched languages.

It’s a weird thing to do in the middle of a series, past the middle really, but I had to have the book immediately. So I joined a midnight lineup and got the book in English. With the 7th I was on holiday so my family wouldn’t let me join the lineup alone but I bought it immediately the next day and locked myself in the bathroom (the only place I was free from the noise of my family in my uncle’s small apartment we were staying at) while I read and cried and read and cried some more.

I’ve revisited the story several times but after becoming fluent in English this whole world of books I could never access before opened up to me and I don’t reread as much as I used to. I’ve a pretty good memory (for stories at least, nothing else) so usually it’s enough for me to look at a book, maybe page through it a bit, to remember the story. Yet I’ve only read the final book once. I think the grief of leaving Harry and everyone who died was too much for me and I just haven’t been able to yet. I’ve also always felt like I need to read them in order, start with Philosopher’s Stone and work my way up to Deathly Hallows. So that’s what I am now doing.

Since I don’t have as much time to read as I did and spend a lot of time on busses (and get horribly carsick if I read on them, a fact I will loathe till the day I die) I decided to listen to some podcasts along the way, specifically ones that discuss the chapters or books one by one in order so I can listen to them following my reading. I’ll also be posting random things on here as I go along, thoughts and comments and of course reblogging a whole bunch of Potter related things.

Thanks for reading and hopefully you’ll enjoy the ride with me :)

title: —un.
body:
“I have a thousand things to say to you, and a thousand reasons not to.”

I love you, I love you, I love you. I love the way your eyebrows furrow together in annoyance, I love how you never fail to clench your fists and turn your feet inwards whenever I speak to you (torment you). I love how you stand up for whatever you think is right. I love how you’re never wrong. I love how you carry yourself. I love how your scent lingers in the air whenever you rush past me…

You drive me insane… but an ‘us’ between us; its impossible.

Blood aside, we belong to different worlds. You are light and I am dark, and there aren’t any shades of grey between. We belong to opposite ends of a spectrum… 

I was raised to hate everything about you, I have to hate you. “She does not deserve someone like you”, but I’m not deserving of you… 

Maybe one day, when all the stars align, I’d be able to tell you how I feel. But for now, only for now…

“(I love you) I hate you.”

—Draco Lucius Malfoy

blog.name: bookishdiplodocus
blog.title: Bookish Diplodocus
blog.description: editor | writer | reader | book siren || my WIP is YA set in a magical library || she/her

body:
Yer a Wizard: tag game

I was tagged by: @freckledfiction (thanks for tagging me! :))

Rules: Answer the 15 questions, and tag however many or few you’d like.  

1) What Hogwarts House were you sorted into?

Ravenclaw.

2) If you could have any magical beast as a pet, what would it be?

I would like the miniature Hungarian Horntail from book 4.

3) Choose a magical mode of travel:

flying car | flu powder | disapparation | broom | vanishing cabinet

4) Hogwarts is hiring; choose a position to apply for:

Gamekeeper | Librarian | Quidditch Referee/Flying Instructor | Defense Against the Dark Arts Teacher

5) Harry Potter’s spell of choice was expelliarmus, what do you think yours would be?

Accio.

6) Pumpkin juice or butterbeer.

7) You have a vial of Felix Felicis for a day. What would you do?

Write a bestselling book.

8) You need somewhere quiet to read, you go to:

the Owlery | Hagrid’s Hut | the Room of Requirement | the library | the Shrieking Shack.

9) Sort one of your favourite non-HP character into a house.

Leo Valdez, Huffelpuff

10) What would your boggart be? And what would you change it to?

A hole. I would change it to a hole filled with chocolate.

11) Would you rather:

be petrified | regrow bone | be attacked by Cornish pixies.

12) “Oh dear, we are in trouble”, pick a punishment:

writing lines with Umbridge | going with Hagrid into the dark forest | signing fan mail for hours on end.

13) The mirror of Erised shows the viewer’s heart’s desire: What would you see if you stood before the mirror today?

Me holding a time-turner so I could take naps and read books and don’t miss out on anything.

14) You can resurrect one character, who would it be and why?

Pandora Lovegood, Luna’s mom, because she died in front of Luna who was 9 at the time.

15) Share a Harry Potter-related gif that is representative of your life at the moment:

I am going to tag 20 writeblrs from my notifications, because I want to get to know you.

@alizans @neverforgetwhoyouare-littlestar @itaintthatkindamoviebruv @moonfiisher @seraphilth @aurumni-writes @theveryparanormalgabriel @h-brook-writes @writingisfancylying @minny-spooky-king @gottaenjoythelittlethingzz @professional-stock-character @n0k-n0k @hardcore-butterfly49 @emilyelizabethfowl @thorhightower @therealslimsappy9000 @clipsy-chan @justmonikism @alleenickel

reblog.comment:
Yer a Wizard: tag game

I was tagged by: @freckledfiction (thanks for tagging me! :))

Rules: Answer the 15 questions, and tag however many or few you’d like.  

1) What Hogwarts House were you sorted into?

Ravenclaw.

2) If you could have any magical beast as a pet, what would it be?

I would like the miniature Hungarian Horntail from book 4.

3) Choose a magical mode of travel:

flying car | flu powder | disapparation | broom | vanishing cabinet

4) Hogwarts is hiring; choose a position to apply for:

Gamekeeper | Librarian | Quidditch Referee/Flying Instructor | Defense Against the Dark Arts Teacher

5) Harry Potter’s spell of choice was expelliarmus, what do you think yours would be?

Accio.

6) Pumpkin juice or butterbeer.

7) You have a vial of Felix Felicis for a day. What would you do?

Write a bestselling book.

8) You need somewhere quiet to read, you go to:

the Owlery | Hagrid’s Hut | the Room of Requirement | the library | the Shrieking Shack.

9) Sort one of your favourite non-HP character into a house.

Leo Valdez, Huffelpuff

10) What would your boggart be? And what would you change it to?

A hole. I would change it to a hole filled with chocolate.

11) Would you rather:

be petrified | regrow bone | be attacked by Cornish pixies.

12) “Oh dear, we are in trouble”, pick a punishment:

writing lines with Umbridge | going with Hagrid into the dark forest | signing fan mail for hours on end.

13) The mirror of Erised shows the viewer’s heart’s desire: What would you see if you stood before the mirror today?

Me holding a time-turner so I could take naps and read books and don’t miss out on anything.

14) You can resurrect one character, who would it be and why?

Pandora Lovegood, Luna’s mom, because she died in front of Luna who was 9 at the time.

15) Share a Harry Potter-related gif that is representative of your life at the moment:

I am going to tag 20 writeblrs from my notifications, because I want to get to know you.

@alizans @neverforgetwhoyouare-littlestar @itaintthatkindamoviebruv @moonfiisher @seraphilth @aurumni-writes @theveryparanormalgabriel @h-brook-writes @writingisfancylying @minny-spooky-king @gottaenjoythelittlethingzz @professional-stock-character @n0k-n0k @hardcore-butterfly49 @emilyelizabethfowl @thorhightower @therealslimsappy9000 @clipsy-chan @justmonikism @alleenickel

summary: prompt #2 with marauder era sirius please? x💕
question: prompt #2 with marauder era sirius please? x💕
answer:
A/N: thank you so much for sending in your request, so sorry for the wait, hope you enjoy!! I was so torn between whether to make this angsty or fun so I’m sorry if it’s a bit of a mess, my writer’s block has been driving me crazy hahah x

ASK / REQUESTS / PROMPTS

#2 - “You look like you need a hug.”

You walked along the halls of Hogwarts in a hurry, admittedly a little late to Transfiguration. If the stairs hadn’t changed, you swore you would of been on time, although you weren’t so sure McGonagall would settle for that excuse. You stopped suddenly as you passed a window, and spotted a familiar figure sitting outside, tearing clumps of grass out of the ground. You usually wouldn’t of been too concerned to see Sirius Black skipping a class, but in this case, he was on his own, a solemn expression on his face. If Sirius Black was skipping class without James Potter, you knew something was wrong. 

Stepping outside, you pulled your robes around you tighter when the cold air hit you, and began to walk towards him. “You look like you need a hug.” You said, sending him a gentle smile as his head whipped around to find you. 

“And you look like you’re late for class… Again.” He said, and as he sent you a playful smirk, you felt the usual butterflies erupt in your stomach. Although nothing had been made official, you knew your heart only belonged to one boy at Hogwarts, and that was Sirius Black. 

You rolled your eyes with an amused expression at his words, and sat down next to him on the grass. You sat in a comfortable silence for a few minutes, watching as the wind rustled the leaves on the leaves. Glancing over, you saw the same solemn expression return to his features and you reached out for his hand, taking it in yours. “Do you want to talk about it?”

And so he did. He told you about the letter he had received from his parents that morning at breakfast, how it reittirated what a disgrace he was to the Black family name, how he had let his whole family down with his choices. He told you about his family’s morals, what they believed in, and how it sickened him every time he thought about it. He told you about how they treated him, the things they had done to him in the past, how he feared he would end up like them, and with each word, you felt the ache in your heart get stronger. 

You moved your hand to rest on his cheek, turning his head so he was looking at you. “You’re nothing like your family, Sirius. Nothing. Don’t ever for a second think you are in any way as horrific as they are.” You told him, running your thumb along his cheek to catch the stray tear that had fallen. “You’re so much better than them, and you should be so proud of yourself for the man you turned out to be, even though you were surrounded with such terrible influences.”

“How can you be so sure?” He asked, his hand coming up to hold on to yours. 

“Because if you were anything like them, I wouldn’t be so madly in love with you.” You smiled, and before you knew it, his lips found yours in a kiss that sent a burning heat throughout your body. Your lips barely parted for a second as his hands found your waist, moving you so you were straddling his lap, your bodies pressed together as your hands tangled through his air. 

You were both panting heavily as the kiss broke, your forehead leaning against his, your hands playing with the hair at the nape of his neck as his fingers traced patterns on your back. “Does this kind of make us official?” You teased, a smirk playing at your lips as he chuckled lightly, before pressing another slow, gentle kiss to your lips. 

“I’ve been yours all along.”

A/N: thank you so much for sending in your request, so sorry for the wait, hope you enjoy!! I was so torn between whether to make this angsty or fun so I’m sorry if it’s a bit of a mess, my writer’s block has been driving me crazy hahah x

summary:
Harry: When are you going to ask Hermione out on a date?
Ron: I don't like her!!!
Harry: Of course you do
Ron: And when are you...
body:
Harry: When are you going to ask Hermione out on a date?
Ron: I don't like her!!!
Harry: Of course you do
Ron: And when are you going to ask Malfoy out on a date?
Harry: I don't like him!!!
Ginny: Denial isn't good, boys
